excerpt.rendered:
MODEL NUMBER : hC-214

DESCRIPTION : Silk Top Lace Wig with Lace at front, Silk Option at top, Stretch mesh at sides & back, and adjustable straps at nape area. This cap is made with Center part directional Silk Top Option. We also make Left part, Right part and Multi directional Silk Top Wig. We can make any color, design, and shape. Please visit our Custom Wig Order Form for other specifications.
